review: It loses one star for cutting out every now and then.  The good news is that it resumes after a second or two without losing anything.  I especially appreciate being able to see all of my photo's and videos that I have taken on my Fire phone.  They go automatically to the cloud and are easily found and played using the Fire Stick.

review: I love this product, it's awesome quality hardware and software.  I love the free month of Amazon Prime that comes with it too!  I def think it has converted me to an Amazonian, as I find myself watching movies, shopping, watching my favorite cable channels via SlingTV.  My only wish would be that it could somehow offer local channels or have apps that could sync and do so.  If anyone knows of any do share! Other than that, No complaints my whole family loves it! And Lord Willing, I'm def signing up for Prime as soon as my free month is over!
